feed.title: ToolJet Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.63.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docker release workflow lts fix ce by @adishM98 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10068
  • LTS [Marketplace]: Appwrite patch by @akshaysasidrn in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10047
  • Correction in CE docker release workflow LTS branch by @adishM98 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10111
  • Performance release 0.1 by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9922
  • Hotfix [LTS] - Bugfixes by @arpitnath in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10146
  • LTS - hotfix: Fix for canvas background color & reserved keyword by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10171
  • hotfix: Events with debounce are not working by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10196
  • release: Performance release 0.1 by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10201

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.62.0...v2.63.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.64.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

‚≠ê Improvements

  • feat : Query manager separated to different tabs by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9823
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/9438
  • fix : Prevent component autofill for selected boxes by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10040
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/9413
  • feat: add custom fallback for images when not found by @Kartik18g in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9943
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/9508
  • fix: selection of copy of selected component for ease by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9818
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/9016
  • fix: selection issue in table row while editing by @Kartik18g in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9944
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/9505
  • feat: Add new revamped multi select and select widget by @nakulnagargade https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9837
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/8229 and https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/8228
  • feat: Show more specific error messages for query failures in the editor by @Kartik18g in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9951
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/8492
  • feat: display query preview data in preview panel and display transformation failure stack trace data in preview panel as well by @Kartik18g in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10129

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • fix: sizing issues in horizontal divider by @Kartik18g in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9942
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/9645
  • fix: mouse release on canvas when properties/styles values selected by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9732
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/9598
  • fix: rest API headers empty state while creating new query by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9729
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/9599
  • fix: remove the mandatory key from password input by @Kartik18g in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9786
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/9700
  • fix: selection issue in table row while editing by @Kartik18g in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9944
  • Fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/9505
  • fix: while adding new rows in table components whenever entered the text and pressed enter it doubles the text by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10112

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.63.0...v2.64.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.65.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üöÄ Features

  • Feature: Aggregate and group by functionality for TJDB in #1070 by @ganesh8056 & @manishkushare
  • Feature: Date with time data type for ToolJet Database #10066 by @shaurya-sharma064
  • Feature: Add cookies support in the REST API datasource in #10166 by @parthy007
  • Feature: Manual toggle for retrying failed REST-API requests in #10166 by @parthy007

‚≠ê Improvements

  • Improve: Adds Infinite scroll loader for dropdown in #10179 by @shaurya-sharma064

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Fix: Drag & drop functionality in TJDB bulk upload in #9827 by @parthy007 & @S-Abdul-Rahman
  • Fix: Create app failure issue because TJDB is disabled in #9082 by @blank0537
  • Fix: Edit drawer on TJDB dashboard selects the row checkbox in #10161 by @blank0537
  • Fix: Foreign key breaking when column name is changed in #9742 by @shaurya-sharma064

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.64.0...v2.65.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.65.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Setting app themes default values on global settings by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10313 and https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10404
  • removed condition to create version from dev env only by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10247
  • Homepage Search Animation fix and DS Connection Typo Fix by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10347
  • Getting 403 error when using multiple apps of different workspace in different tabs (public-apps) by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10360
  • Exposing password in basic auth success request URL by @shah21 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10320
  • Added script for creation of release branch by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10372
  • Fix for public app not loading by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10378
  • Added rest of the REST API plugin basic auth fixes by @shah21 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10377
  • Updated "Test connection" text for datasource automation by @Mekhla-Asopa in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10380

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.65.0...v2.65.1

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.65.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fixed alignment issue in plugins by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10422, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10426 and https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10446
  • New loading state UI by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10381
  • Loading State UI fix by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10427

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.65.1...v2.65.2
